title: Get Down to 150 - Finally, Healthy Natural Foods for Busy Women to Melt Fat Without Dieting or Insane Exercise so You Can Fit Into Those Skinny Jeans in 3 Simple Steps
description: If you're a busy woman looking for a simple, affordable and actionable solutions to healthy weight loss using natural foods then this book is for you.Imagine: You walk into a room and all eyes are on you. They respect you and yes envy you a little bit.The first person you talk to asks "What's your secret?"This could be you right now. You can get fast results while being healthy. And it's possible to sustain those results.
author: Clint Evans
